account.create.description: Follow the instruction to create a Pinbox account
account.create.qrcode_explanation: During this step, a secure random passphrase for your account is being generated. When you click the Stop button an unique passphrase is shown, or you can re-generate a new one
account.details.description: This is your Burst Account, which is related to Pinbox
account.details.title: Account Details
account.finish.summary: Congratulations. Your account is set up.
account.info.has_secured: Yes, I wrote down/printed the account information and stored securely
account.info.private_section: The information in this section are private and must not be passed to others
account.info.public_section: The information in this section are public and can be passed to others
account.info.secure_information: It's important that you keep the private information in a safe place. We recommend to save the certificate as PDF using the print function, and store it in a password store tool, like KeePass
account.info.title: Pinbox Account Information
account.pin.explanation: The PIN is an alphanumeric value, that you can remember easily. It is needed to confirm your transactions/payments. In contrast to the passphrase the PIN can be changed or even recreated.
account.set.description: Follow the instructions to setup Pinbox with your existing Burst account
account.set.passphrase_description: Enter your secret Passphrase to identify your existing account. Of course, the passphrase won't be saved and/or sent to anybody.
account.state.active.description: Your account is active and fully secured
account.state.inactive.description: Your account has no public key yet. To fully secure your account you should execute a transaction
account.state.notfound.description: Your account was not found in the blockchain. Are you really sure using that account?
account.state.claimedFreeSpace.descripti: You have claimed your free space already
account.activate.success: Your account is being activated. This may take a few moments
app.pinlock.enter_pin.description: Enter your PIN to unlock Pinbox
app.pinlock.enter_pin.label: Enter PIN
app.pinlock.enter_pin.title: Pinbox Lock
app.dialog.enter_pin.description: Enter your PIN to confirm transaction
app.dialog.enter_pin.label: Enter PIN
app.dialog.enter_pin.title: PIN Required
app.forgot_pin_panel.description: If you have forgotten your PIN, you can reset the application, log in again with your existing account, and redefine your PIN. You will need your passphrase
app.forgot_pin_panel.title: Forgot PIN?
dashboard.dialog.rename_file.description:
You can now rename the file or folder 
{label}
.
dashboard.dialog.rename_file.label: New Name
dashboard.dialog.rename_file.title: Rename File or Folder
dashboard.filetree.title: Your files
dashboard.filetree.subtitle: Drop your files here and push them into the sky
dashboard.capacity.title: Your space
dashboard.capacity.subtitle: See your available and used space at a glance
dashboard.capacity.caption: {subscriptionCount} subscription(s) totalling {total}. {usedAbsolute} used ({usedRelative})
dashboard.claim_space.title: Welcome to Pinbox
dashboard.claim_space.subtitle: Claim your free space
dashboard.claim_space.claimed: Just a moment please. Your free space is being prepared.
dashboard.claim_space.caption: It may take a tiny moment until the space is available
dashboard.claim_space.description:html: With Pinbox you can save your files secure and distributed on the Internet without third parties being able to access and/or use them. Get your free storage space so you can try Pinbox right away. To learn more about Pinbox just visit https://pinbox.space
dashboard.activating.title: Account Activation
dashboard.activating.subtitle: Just a moment, your account is being activated
dashboard.activating.description:html: Did you know that your account was created in the Burst Blockchain? In order for you to be able to use the account fully, it must be validated by the network. This will take a few moments. Time for a coffee, tea â˜• or a beer 🍺.
dashboard.activating.subtitle.notactivat: Oh, your account needs to be activated
dashboard.activating.description.notacti:
Actually your account should already be activated?!
Only with an activated account you can use Pinbox. Please activate your account now. This may take a moment, as the account has to be validated by the decentralized network.
dropbox.drop_here: Drag and drop your files or folders in this area
error.brs.unknown_error: Ah, snap! An unknown error occurred
error.no_pool_info: No Pool Information available. Please contact the support!
login.description: If you have a Burst account already you can enter with your existing account. Otherwise, you may create a new one.
login.title: Login
pools.table.subtitle: A Pool manages the distribution of files for the decentralized network. Each Pool has slightly different characteristics like pricing, amount of connected nodes, etc. To use Pinbox you need to select exactly one Pool.
pools.table.title: Choose a Pool
settings.reset_explanation: By resetting Pinbox, you remove your account information and further local data. You won't delete your pinned files. These can always be restored.
subscription.costs.text: {capacity} {unit} of space costs {burst} BURST per month
subscriptions.list.title: Your Subscriptions
subscriptions.list.subtitle: Check out how your capacity is being composed
subscriptions.list.table.title: Active Subscriptions
settings.title: Application Settings
